member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.StringResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.ChangeSetValidationHelper_DataChangedConflictError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The data has been modified in the underlying store..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.ChangeSetValidationHelper_DataDeletedConflictError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The data has been deleted in the underlying store..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.Common_GreaterThanOrEqualToZero
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value must be greater than or equal to 0..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.Common_NullOrEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value cannot be null or empty..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.Common_PageCannotBeNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Page cannot be null. Please ensure that this operation is being performed in the context of an ASP.NET request..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DataSourceHelper_CannotConvertType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot convert value of parameter '{0}' from '{1}' to '{2}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSource_Description
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Connect to data exposed by a WCF RIA Services Domain Service..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSource_DisplayName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Domain Service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSource_EnableDelete
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies whether the Delete operation is enabled..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSource_EnableInsert
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies whether the Insert operation is enabled..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSource_EnableUpdate
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies whether the Update operation is enabled..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_CustomPropertyDoesNotMatchQueryMethodProperty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value of the {0} property ('{1}') on DomainDataSource '{2}' does not match any of the parameters on the query method '{3}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_DeleteNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DomainDataSource '{0}' does not support the Delete operation unless EnableDelete is set to true..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_DomainServiceInstanceFromCreatingEventNotCompatibleWithDomainServiceNameProperty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The domain service instance of type '{0}' obtained through the DomainServiceCreating event on DomainDataSource '{1}' must be a type assignable to '{2}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_DomainServiceTypeNameMustBeDomainService
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The domain service type used by DomainDataSource '{0}' must extend DomainService..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_DomainServiceTypeNameNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not find the type specified in the DomainServiceTypeName property of DomainDataSource '{0}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_DomainServiceTypeNameNotSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DomainServiceTypeName property of DomainDataSource '{0}' must specify a domain service type..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_InsertNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DomainDataSource '{0}' does not support the Insert operation unless EnableInsert is set to true..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_MaximumRowsParameterNameNotSet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The MaximumRowsParameterName property on DomainDataSource '{0}' does not have a value. It must be set to a valid value when the StartRowIndexParameterName property is set..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_QueryMethodMissingTotalCountParameter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The query method '{0}' on DomainDataSource '{1}' does not have an out parameter that sets the total count. When StartRowIndexParameterName and MaximumRowsParameterName are set the query method must set the total count..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_QueryMethodNotComposable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The query method '{0}' on DomainDataSource '{1}' is not composable..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_QueryMethodNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not find the query method '{0}' defined on the DomainDataSource '{1}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_QueryMethodNotSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The QueryName property of DomainDataSource '{0}' must specify the name of a domain service query method..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_QueryParameterMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The QueryParameters collection on DomainDataSource '{0}' is missing a parameter named '{1}' that is required by the query method '{2}'. Add the appropriate parameter to the control's QueryParameters collection. The parameter value can also be provided in an event handler for the Querying event..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_StartRowIndexParameterNameNotSet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The StartRowIndexParameterName property on DomainDataSource '{0}' does not have a value. It must be set to a valid value when the MaximumRowsParameterName property is set..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainDataSourceView_UpdateNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DomainDataSource '{0}' does not support the Update operation unless EnableUpdate is set to true..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainModelProvider_CannotFindDefaultQueryMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot find the default query method for type '{0}' in the domain service '{1}'. When a type has multiple query methods associated with it then one of them must be marked as the default one using QueryAttribute..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainTableProvider_GetQueryContextMustBeADomainService
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The context must be a DomainService..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.DomainValidator_UnableToFindDataSource
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to find the data source associated with the control '{0}' that DomainValidator '{1}' is referring to..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.StringResources.EntityOperationException_ErrorOccurred
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An error has occurred..

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityOperationException
member.summary: Wrap a ChangeSetEntry in an exception NOTE: Temporary to unblock the ASP.NET team!
